title: Sub-pixel Accuracy
content:
Loving the sub-pixel work being done by [miha](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611234413/http:/typophile.com/blog/26405)

[http://typophile.com/blog/26405](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611234413/http:/typophile.com/blog/26405 "http://typophile.com/blog/26405")

Awesome.
author: gingerbeardman

comments.content: Thanks! Why don't you try it yourself? It's not hard, and I see you've already done pixel fonts! There are many directions in subpixel font design that haven't been explored before.
If only I had more time! :)
